name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing and implementing complex applications using **.NET**, **C#**, **SQL**, and **MS SQL Server**. Proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, including **Vue.js**, and RESTful services, with a strong focus on delivering scalable solutions. Adept at optimizing performance and streamlining development processes, demonstrating expertise in modern development practices. Proven capability to lead cross-functional teams and successfully deliver projects that meet strategic objectives.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and developed robust web applications using **.NET 7**, **C#**, and ReactJS, enhancing overall user satisfaction by **25%**.
Implemented efficient SQL database solutions and optimized **MS SQL Server** queries to achieve a **20%** reduction in average query execution time.
Created and maintained RESTful APIs for smooth integration and data access across services using **.NET** and various database technologies.
Architected a microservices framework leveraging **.NET Core** for better scalability, improving system maintainability.
Integrated real-time data processing with **Apache Kafka** and managed task queues utilizing **RabbitMQ**, enhancing throughput and resilience of the application.
Utilized **Redis** for caching strategies, leading to a **35%** improvement in application response times, effectively reducing database load.
Established CI/CD processes through **Azure DevOps**, successfully achieving a **40%** decrease in deployment time.
Collaborated with UX/UI teams to refine the user interface and enhance the overall user experience.
Developed advanced data visualization features using **D3.js** and **Three.js** for enriched reporting capabilities.
Implemented secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms with JWT technology, ensuring application security.

- Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using **.NET** and **C#**, ensuring secure and efficient data handling essential for real-time application performance.
- Designed and implemented database solutions with **MS SQL Server** and **SQL**, optimizing queries to enhance data retrieval speed by **30%**.
- Built and contributed to user interfaces with **Vue.js**, improving user engagement by **25%** through interactive and responsive design elements.
- Integrated advanced caching mechanisms leveraging **Redis** to minimize latency, achieving a **25%** increase in application performance.
- Spearheaded the transition to a microservices architecture utilizing **RabbitMQ** and **Apache Kafka**, resulting in scalable and resilient system design.
- Established CI/CD workflows through **GitHub Actions**, successfully reducing deployment errors by **30%** and streamlining the development lifecycle.
- Conducted thorough code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, fostering a collaborative and productive team environment.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and track development progress, ensuring projects are delivered on time and meet stakeholder expectations.
- Created interactive and visually engaging data representations using **D3.js**, enhancing project status visualization for stakeholders.
- Managed diverse database technologies by ensuring high availability and performance for both **MSSQL** and **MySQL**, driving overall project success.

• Developed scalable applications using **.NET Framework**, **C#**, and **Vue.js**, leading to a **20%** increase in sales team productivity.
• Implemented **RabbitMQ** for efficient message queue management, decreasing system load during peak hours by effectively handling up to **500** customer notification messages concurrently.
• Designed a library of reusable components in **Angular** and **C#**, reducing future project development time by more than **30%**.
• Utilized **SQL** and **MS SQL Server** to enhance data retrieval processes, achieving a **25%** improvement in query speed.
• Led efforts to migrate legacy applications from **ASP.NET WebForms** to **.NET Core**, resulting in a **40%** boost in system performance.
• Collaborated with the DevOps team on automating builds and releases using **Azure DevOps**, shortening deployment timeframes by **50%**.
• Successfully integrated various third-party APIs, facilitating seamless data exchange across systems and enhancing interoperability.
• Enhanced the user interface of client dashboards utilizing **Vue.js**, improving overall user experience.
• Participated in daily standups and code reviews to maintain high coding standards, contributing to **100%** project alignment with goals.
• Created detailed technical documentation and user guides for internal systems, fostering a better understanding of technologies among team members.

skills:
Programming Languages: C#, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript
	
Backend Frameworks: .NET, NodeJS, ExpressJS, NestJS
	
Frontend Frameworks: ReactJS, NextJS, Angular, VueJS, NuxtJS, Material UI, Three.js, D3.js, React Native, Flutter, Chakra UI, TailwindCSS
	
API Technologies: RESTful API, GraphQL
	
Serverless and Cloud Functions: AWS, Azure
	
Databases: MSSQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, CosmosDB
	
DevOps: CI/CD pipelines
	
Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS, Azure
	
Other: UX/UI Design, Git, GitHub, Microservices, Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, NUnit, xUnit, Selenium, Moq, Postman, Cypress, JMeter, Jest, Solidity, Ether.js, Web3.js, Ethereum
